data.title: Soap actors connections
data.meta_description: It always makes me think about what goes on on set of soaps when theres characters that are played by actors in soaps that have been in other shows together.
data.text:
From the current cast of EastEnders, the following have appeared in The Bill:

June Brown (Dot Branning) played Mrs. Doleman in 1984.

Steve McFadden (Phil Mitchell) played a gun dealer in 1989.

John Bardon (Jim Branning) played Robbo Robbins in 1990.

Perry Fenwick (Billy Mitchell) played Matty Davis in 1984 and 1992, Lee in 1989, a store detective in 1994 and Dave Sheriton in 1997.

Derek Martin (Charlie Slater) played George Talbot in 1997.

Ricky Groves (Garry Hobbs) played Stu in the The Bill spin-off Burnside in 2000.

Laila Morse (Mo Harris) played Janice Ryan in 1997.

Rudolph Walker (Patrick Trueman) played Papa Reeves in 1990 and Ivan Walker in 1992.

Cliff Parisi (Minty Peterson) played Anthony Spall in 2003.

Joe Swash (Mickey Miller) played Adam Summers in 1999.

Laurie Brett (Jane Collins) played Irene Murray in 1998.

David Spinx (Keith Miller) played a porter in 1999 and Trevor Saunders in 2003.

Gillian Wright (Jean Slater) played Sharon Little in 2006.

Petra Letang (Naomi Julien) played Charlene Gayle in 2005.

Charlie Clements (Bradley Branning) played Adrian Bickman in 2005.

Kellie Shirley (Carly Wicks) played Allanah in 2003.

Dave Hill (Bert Atkinson) played Sgt. Harry Haynes in 2005.

Tiana Benjamin (Chelsea Fox) played Tania Baptiste in 2004.

Diane Parish (Denise Wicks) played DC Eva Sharpe from 2002 to 2004, then played the same character in the The Bill spin-off M.I.T.: Murder Investigation Team in 2005.

Stuart Laing (Rob Minter) played Jeff Clarke in 2005.

Amanda Drew (May Wright) played Ruth Taylor in the The Bill spin-off M.I.T.: Murder Investigation Team in 2003.

Elaine Tan (Li Chong) played Shona Dickins in 2006.

Linda Henry (Shirley Carter) played Anne Riley in 1993.

Kika Mirylees (Hazel Hobbs) played Maria Huntly in 1990.

Also, Madeline Duggan (Lauren Branning) and Amanda Drew (May Wright) were in the short film Between Us together.

0

The nurse Tess is the sister of Colin Jackson

And Daz in Emaerdale is the twin brother of the kid in Shameless (I forget his name)

moomoomoo wrote:

Every actor there's ever been has been in The Bill! You only have to read the biographies in the back of programmes from West End shows to see it!

and Casualty and Holby City and quite a few in crime watch!

Mike Reid also appered in the bill earlier this year as a dogdgey property developer and Gillian Taylforth is currently playing Sgt Nikki Wright.

Sophie Tompson (Stella in EE) is the sister of Emma Tompson
